item.title: Enable Chatbots on the phone using Amazon Lex and the Amazon Chime SDK
item.description: Telephony made a huge leap forward last week. It’s insanely easy to build a voice chatbot for phone calls!

item.title: My First Amazon Blog... ML/AI Chatbot over the Phone!
item.description: A month ago I told you I changed roles at AWS. Now I can show you what I’ve done since then!
